mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_RATING, PROD_IMG_THUM, PROD_CNT FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PROD_STATUS = '판매중' AND PROD_CREATED_AT BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND CURDATE() ORDER BY PROD_RATING DESC
